doc.title: Captives
doc.plot: This is a collection of three stories illustrating that a typical neighborhood has many secrets to tell. The tales show the inner fetish desires of some of the residents in the neighborhood. The first story is of a young debutant. Her life of gentleman suitors trying to win her with wealth and possessions have left her with desires to be brutally dominated. The second story is of a subservient airline stewardess that releases her daytime angst as a nighttime dominitrix. The third story is of a young couple struggling for mutual sexual fulfillment. They suddenly find joy by sharing leather clothing and articles in their play together. Finally, the stewardess gets a few of the neighbors together to watch a bondage video, which serves to release some of their mutual desires.
